sense.def: Alternative Names shan zhe 閃折 , shan sun 閃損 , shan niu 閃拗等.

Pathological Condition of a shang sun 傷損 , injury, affecting the extremities and/or the body, caused by a sudden accidental movement. Sheng ji zong lu 聖濟總錄 143: 治一切傷折及驢馬墜墮， 打撲閃肭，疼痛不可忍者，五傷接骨丸方 , “Recipe for the pills for five types of injury and bonesetting to cure all types of injury and fracture, [injuries from] falling from a donkey or horse, from a blow with a sprain and unbearable pain”.
